alert.note: Alert for Morgan; Pike (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 28 at 8:26PM CST until further notice by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Illinois... Illinois River at Valley City. Illinois River at La Grange LD. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Illinois... Illinois River at Meredosia. River forecasts are based on observed precipitation and forecast precipitation for the next 48 hours. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY EVENING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Illinois River at Meredosia. * WHEN...From Wednesday evening until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 20.0 feet, Beach Road just north of Shady Acres floods near this height. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 PM CST Sunday the stage was 15.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage Wednesday evening and continue rising to 19.3 feet Saturday evening. Additional rises are possible thereafter. - Flood stage is 17.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (7:00 am) Location Stg Stage Tue Wed Thu Fri Sat Illinois River Meredosia 17.0 15.0 15.8 16.6 17.4 18.2 18.9 &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. This product, along with additional weather and stream information, is available at https://water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=lsx.
